column2: JPMorgan again wins dismissal of whistleblower lawsuit in U.S.JPMorgan again wins dismissal of whistleblower lawsuit in U.SJPMorgan again wins dismissal of whistleblower lawsuit in U.S. NEW YORK JPMorgan Chase & Co on Friday won the dismissal of a U.S. whistleblower lawsuit filed by a former vice president who claimed the bank ignored red flags about a client's potential fraud
